title: Netanyahu’s Gaza & Lebanon Conflicts Bleed Israeli Economy; Central Bank Makes This Scary Revelation
description:
Netanyahu’s Gaza & Lebanon Conflicts Bleed Israeli Economy; Central Bank Makes This Scary Revelation

As Israel battles on two fronts—Gaza and Lebanon—its economy faces a severe blow. The Bank of Israel has drastically cut growth projections, expecting only 0.5% growth in 2024, down from earlier est...
